resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

ursabot commented on pull request #12088:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12088#issuecomment-1006826555


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 69c25ed136da984718e7fbb5de83ee11515809e8 and contender = 689eeaaf79e8dad8cf58a504e6530e0fc2c4e57f. 689eeaaf79e8dad8cf58a504e6530e0fc2c4e57f is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/1a79ebe8ce8845f8b6331da94cee21c6...55e9ff9116da48aeaed9e0a75c8d4f97/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/f9e930365dea445fa98ef35d576c4830...99eb857cb95b474fb6d3c93029a8c3a6/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/24dd0d9375164dd79529731f04127db6...fdb829d8a2e14cc080f71e8e9bda3ec5/)
   Supported benchmarks:
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: Supported benchmark langs: Python. Runs only benchmarks with cloud = True
   ursa-i9-9960x: Supported benchmark langs: Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: Supported benchmark langs: C++, Java

fields.description: It's a packaging bug of ruby-gobject-introspection deb.
fields.summary: [Packaging][deb] "ruby -r gi" doesn't work on old Debian/Ubuntu
